backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining surgery case types, access-controlled profile and case CRUD operations, and timestamp-based sorting utilities.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend files, components, and test IDs associated with sync and errorâ€‘handling improvements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend source files covering hooks, components, utilities, and data handling behavior.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_NOTES.md: Deployment guide explaining when and how to redeploy the frontend with fresh backend bindings.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the frontend root and main TypeScript module.
frontend/redeploy.sh: Script performing deterministic clean rebuild and deployment of the frontend with deployment summary output.
Script that wipes cached artifacts, installs deps, ensures backend deployment, regenerates bindings, and rebuilds the frontend.
frontend/scripts/verify-live-backend-bin: Guide for verifying that the live frontend uses fresh backend bindings and correct canister IDs.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, backend connection, profile setup, case list and form modals, sorting, and sync UI.
frontend/src/components/cases/CameraCapt: Placeholder file for a camera capture component with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseCard.t: Displays a surgery case card with patient details, task toggling, edit and delete actions, and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseForm.t: Form component for creating or editing surgery cases with prefill logic, validation, and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseList.t: Lists surgery cases with filtering, sorting, loading states, and integration with authentication and connectivity.
A controlled date picker combining a date input and popover calendar with validation.
frontend/src/components/cases/Demographi: Textarea that extracts and returns demographics from pasted text for quick form population.
frontend/src/components/cases/EmptyCases: Shows empty-state messaging and optional migration guidance depending on authentication and connectivity.
frontend/src/components/cases/SortContro: UI controls to select sort field and toggle ascending/descending order.
frontend/src/components/cases/TasksCheck: Renders required, incomplete tasks with checkboxes and highlights specific task types.
frontend/src/components/csv/CsvExportBut: Provides a button that converts stored cases to CSV and triggers a file download.
frontend/src/components/csv/CsvImportDia: Modal dialog for uploading a CSV, parsing rows into cases, and importing them into the store.
frontend/src/components/errors/BackendCo: Displays a troubleshooting banner with retry and documentation links when backend connection fails.
frontend/src/components/errors/ModalErro: Error boundary for modal content that logs errors and offers a close action on failure.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders application footer with current year and a referral link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header showing app title and login/logout handling with identity and environment badge.
frontend/src/components/startup/StartupR: Recovery screen shown on startup connection errors with retry, reload, and token-specific guidance.
frontend/src/components/sync/SyncStatusB: Displays online, backend connection, and sync status with actions to sync or retry backend connection.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithError.ts: Wraps useActor to track initialization errors, provide retry logic, and expose actor, loading, and error states.
Combines identity and actor state to determine backend connectivity, probes a ping endpoint, and offers full retry handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useCasesStore.ts: Manages merged local and server surgery cases with React Query, supporting add and update operations synced to local storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnvironmentLabel.t: Derives a simple Draft or Live environment label based on the current hostname.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, including login flow, state management, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status using navigator events.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on user profiles and surgery cases through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSync.ts: Handles syncing local surgery cases with the backend, including pagination fetches, conflict merging, and state updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying base border and body color utilities.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a `cn` helper that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/types/cases.ts: Defines surgery case-related TypeScript types including local case extensions and form data structures.
Classifies backend errors into categories and generates user-friendly messages, including actor initialization helpers.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Implements CSV export and parsing for surgery cases with validation, error tracking, and task column handling.
frontend/src/utils/dates.ts: Provides timezone-safe utilities for validating, converting, and formatting date-only strings and nanosecond values.
frontend/src/utils/demographicsExtract.t: Extracts patient demographics from text using regex-based deterministic parsing with fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/draftAdminToken.ts: Retrieves and validates a persisted draft admin token from URL parameters or sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/localPersistence.ts: Loads, saves, and clears locally persisted surgery cases in localStorage with bigint handling and normalization.
frontend/src/utils/mergeCases.ts: Merges local and server surgery cases, preserving local-only fields and preparing combined data for sync operations.
frontend/src/utils/prefill.ts: Finds the latest case for a given MRN and extracts demographic data for prefill.
frontend/src/utils/tasksChecklist.ts: Defines task checklist structure and utilities to create, normalize, or derive required tasks for surgery cases.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, layout, animations, and loading plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing schema, known issues, existing features, and pending feature requests for the Surgery Case Tracker.
